channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SD

item.title: Report E-2024090311
item.description:
Report E-2024090311

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-18T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-15
  • City: SIOUX FALLS
  • State: SD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 2-quarts of Chem craft chemlife 24 sealer released from a 5-gallon metal pail due to a forklift accident. The release impacted on the concrete dock and inside trailer#463-9497. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel were capable of cleaning the release with the PPE available on site.
